entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this morning. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
